item.title: Ten killed in Austria school shooting
item.description: Police say the gunman also died, with the the country's interior minister saying he was a former pupil.

item.title: Gunshots heard and students evacuate in videos filmed at Austrian school
item.description: Video verified by the BBC shows students being evacuated from the school in the city of Graz.

item.title: Greta Thunberg deported, Israel says, after Gaza aid boat intercepted
item.description: The activists' yacht, which was trying to carry aid to Gaza, was intercepted by Israeli forces in the early hours of Monday.

item.title: UK sanctions far-right Israeli ministers for 'inciting violence' against Palestinians
item.description: Security Minister Itamar Ben-Gvir and Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich will both face a travel ban, the UK says.

item.title: Russian drones buzz for hours over Kyiv - and they're getting more destructive
item.description: Ukraine is in the middle of the most sustained bombardment since the early stages of the war.
